Articles.Content: Im still not seeing a powersource also my Rover got killed by the space kraken. Damnit.
When I released the skycrane it just spazzed the crap out, and like spawned in tentacles and lashed around and then imploded my rover. Try number 2! I dont quicksave so this might be a while :3

Oh, forgot to ask: Whats powering the Mk Twain rovers?

Two RTGs stuck on the probe body. More than enough for those science instruments, the light and the camera to run at the same time.

Two RTGs stuck on the probe body. More than enough for those science instruments, the light and the camera to run at the same time.

I dont see them.. did you clip them through or something? Or am I just missing something really obvious here

I noticed the lack of good pictures on my post quite... disturbing. So here's a couple more of them, if you want to replicate them:

Mk Twain:

(Close-up from behind)

(Scale, compared to an engineer. Both at ground level)

NOVA:

(Two close shots [it was made using the Ordan industries telescopes])

(Scale, compared to an engineer. Both at ground level)

The first picture has a Ti-84 calculator on it 0_0

This thread delivers.

Nice designs, info and chat...

Yeah, I clipped the two RTGs on the probe body, kinda cheaty... I know.

The calculator is from the Protractor mod, if you want to download it.

For the delivery systen I had to think outside of the box, because it doesn't have any attachment points on top. I went for an overly complicated and dangerous structure with parachutes and landing gear, so the rover can decouple from it when it's safely on the ground. I had to turn my computer off because it's 12:30 AM now

Tomorrow I'll post some screenshots of a "simulated" re-entry, descent and landing on kerbin so you can see how I will do it on Duna when I'm done tweaking the design... But until then, I'm astropapi1, fly safe!

Yeah, I clipped the two RTGs on the probe body, kinda cheaty... I know.

Cya. Im for some reasonf ailing horribly at getting an encounter with DUna. have been trying for 4 hours.

This thread delivers.

Nice designs, info and chat...

hehe glad you like it
Great news: I have achieved an orbit around Duna with the rocket carrying the Rover! Now its only a matter of pinpointing our landing site
Decided to name the rover Journey. just an fyi ;3

On the date 6/23/2013 Entity Space Exploration successfully landed an unmanned rover named Journey on Duna. Journey transmitted for 8 minutes, and then fell silent. The following images and messages were transmitted back to KSC before we lost contact with Journey:

Parachutes deployed...

Heatshield holding...

Anomaly detected...

Heat shield ejected...

Successful landing...

Decoupled Skycrane...

Systems check...

Thermometer functional...

Barometer functional...

Camera functional...

Emergency Solarpanel functional...

Motor functional...

6 wheels functional...

System check complete...

All systems ago...

Investigating anomaly...

Approaching Anomaly...

Movement Dete- *static* emergn-*static*-powe- *static*

Shutti-*static* dow-*static*

After the 4th distorted transmission we lost all contact.

Mission outcome: Unknown

Mission conclusion: We are not alone.
Isn't it a bit early to conclude that we're not alone?

Isn't it a bit early to conclude that we're not alone?

Nope. (filling 10 character blah blah)

Isn't it a bit early to conclude that we're not alone?

Why would it be too early? We lost a rover after it went too close to a statue or monument of sorts built on a planet that no Kerbal has ever been to. It had to have been made by other intelligent life!

*Disregard this message *

Edited June 24, 2013 by Odo

Hey, if you want, I can send you the Mk Twain rover design.

You'll need:

-B9: Just for some little lights on the side of the rover.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25241-0-20-2-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R3-2-New-pods-IVAs-engines-fuselages-structures

-The Lazor Cam: Pretty obvious, heh?

-Protractor: Just for looks, it adds the Ti-84 on it's back.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/21544-20-Protractor-Rendez-Plugin-v2-4-1-5-22-13?highlight=Protractor+rendezvous

I can also upload the NOVA 2 telescope, it only needs the small telescope lens from the Ordan Industries Telescope Pack:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24639-0-20-0-162-Ordan-Industries-Telescope!-Last-Updated-May-27-2013

K. I'll post some shots of my (quite primitive) landing system for the Mk Twain rovers once I get to my main gaming rig, I'm on my phone now.

Haha Im on my phone too

Aww man, my face of Duna is underground.

Or did they fix that in the new version?

Scramble the rovers!

Aww man, my face of Duna is underground.

Or did they fix that in the new version?

Scramble the rovers!

You have to have your graphics on the highest setting to see the face. same goes for the northpole ufo also I wasn't trying to land near the face, I didn't even know where it was, as I've never explored duna till now. so I just got incredibly lucky haha. I was pretty much shouting "NO WAY" When I saw it under me.

Turns out the reason Journey went offline was because KSC forgot to pay the power bill. We're back online exploring the surface of Duna!

The Dawn Mk II satellite orbiting Duna has gotten a picture of the face from orbit:

Our scientists have come to the conclusion its just a lighting effect caused by shadows..

A lovely view of Ike here on a Duna Mountain.

The first night on Duna has fallen, and Journey has gone star gazing.

Edited June 24, 2013 by Odo
Them power bills, always screwing important government rovers on Mars...

Them power bills, always screwing important government rovers on Mars...

I know. Who needs em.

I think my next mission is going to be sending a probe plane to Duna A glider with a nuclear engine. It'll cover much more ground much faster then Journey. And then after that, maybe, a MANNED MISSION
